languages.english-overview:
Sharetronix is the world's favorite opensource microblogging platform.
Sharetronix enables people to exchange ideas and multimedia in real-time.
Sharetronix is released under the Sharetronix Personal License.
languages.english-features:
The features are as follows:
User Profiles
Status Updates
Real-Time Dashboard
Groups
Security settings
Multimedia
Business Card
Member mentions in status update and comment
Content Tagging
Search Center
Real-Time RSS Aggregation
Twitter Feed Import
Integrations
Mobile Version
Community Leaders (statistics)
Themes & customization
Reshare messages
API (Twitter-compatible)
SEO Friendly
Administration
Posting from Twitter to Sharetronix
Direct post from Sharetronix to Facebook and Twitter
Statistics
